meanings.definition: A person who installs, operates, maintains, or repairs electrical wiring and equipment.
meanings.sent1: The electricians fixed the broken wires in the house.
meanings.sent2: We hired electricians to install new lights in our office building.
meanings.sent3: The electricians joked that they were 'shocking' good at their job.
meanings.sent4: The electricians were like wizards, casting spells to bring light into the darkness.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the electricians who saved us from the power outage last winter.
